column2: "Planet Amduscia: Inviolable Domain: Magnetite Graveyard Area 1"

"Planet Amduscia: Inviolable Domain: Magnetite Graveyard Area 2"

"Relying on Xiao's last known words, Sara
goes to Amduscia to speak with the
Dragonkin Chief, Ro Kamits, in order to
see what she needs to do as Xiao's kin.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
